headline: NextEra Energy (NYSE:NEE) Announces New Leadership and US$120 Billion Infrastructure Investment
summary: Recent executive changes at NextEra Energy (NYSE:NEE) have seen the company focus on strengthening its leadership team with the promotion of Brian Bolster to President and CEO, and Mike Dunne stepping up as CFO. These appointments come amid a broader market context in which the company's stock price moved up 5.95% over the past month. The company's leadership changes are positioned against a backdrop of broader market instability with major indices like the S&P 500, Nasdaq, and Dow Jones...

headline: NextEra Energy Resources CEO Rebecca Kujawa to Retire
summary: NextEra Energy CFO Brian Bolster will become CEO for NextEra Energy Resources, and NextEra Energy Treasurer Mike Dunne will become CFO, the company says.

raw.headline: NextEra Energy Resources CEO Rebecca Kujawa to Retire

headline: NextEra Energy to meet with investors throughout March 2025
summary: NextEra Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NEE) expects to meet with investors throughout March 2025 to discuss, among other things, long-term growth rate expectations, reaffirming those presented on the Jan. 24, 2025, fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 financial results call. Investors and other interested parties can access a copy of the most recent presentation materials at www.NextEraEnergy.com/investors.
